mapper.select: SELECT id, adm_id AS admId, lec_code AS lecCode, title, teacher , topic, target, rdate, length, rating, price, img , disc_rate AS discRate, is_delete AS isDelete , del_date AS delDate, hit FROM lec WHERE id=#{id}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lec (id, adm_id, lec_code, title, teacher, topic, target , rdate, length, rating, price, img, disc_rate, is_delete, del_date, hit) VALUES (lec_seq.NEXTVAL, #{admId},#{lecCode}, #{title}, #{teacher}, #{topic} , #{target}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy.MM.dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{length}, 0, #{price}, #{img}, 0 , '0', null, 0)
